localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Fluently is an online distraction-free editor with a translator, multilingual grammar checker, and synonym library built-in. Improve your writing in a foreign language.
nodes.title: Fluently - Write fluently in any language
nodes.author: Milber Ferreira

nodes.excerpt: Commons is an audio-first communication platform that recreates the â€˜tap on the shoulderâ€™. Itâ€™s super easy to use: Login with Slack. Tap to talk. See the team on 1 screen. Record, transcribe, and assign action items. Connect like youâ€™re in the same room.
nodes.title: Commons - Private Clubhouse for your team to collaborate and connect
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: lemstash is a curated directory of 250+ handpicked tools and guides that will help you in building and growing your startup. The guides are filtered by AARRR funnel and tools by categories so you can pick the best content specifically for your need.
nodes.title: lemstash - The best curation of 250+ tools and guides for startups
nodes.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMerÃ©

nodes.excerpt: Rize is a time tracker that makes you more productive. It helps you be more in control of your workday and builds better habits by encouraging you to be more focused and more efficient. Currently available on macOS. Windows and Linux coming soon.
nodes.title: Rize - An intelligent time tracker that makes you more productive
nodes.author: Will Goto

nodes.excerpt: Camaradly makes annual reviews painless and helps companies structure authentic conversations around feedback, engagement, and growth. Overall, Camaradly is a culture platform that helps companies build a culture of high performance and employee engagement.
nodes.title: Camaradly - Make performance reviews painless & increase engagement
nodes.author: Mannan Amin

nodes.excerpt: Visual Flows is user flow kit. Map out key user paths fast and identify opportunities to reduce friction, improve the experience of using your planned or existing site or app.
nodes.title: Visual Flows for Figma - Brainstorm, explore, and document your workflow
nodes.author: Yoonuch Chayhet

nodes.excerpt: Time is a limited resource - and to spend it efficiently going forward the first step is to know how you spend it right now. That's what Trac! helps you to do.
nodes.title: Trac! - Record your time with ease
nodes.author: Mudit Gulati

nodes.excerpt: See real presence and instantly drop-in to connect.â € â € Automatic status tells you when teammates are in deep focus. â € Catch-up on missed team discussions with an AI summarized feed of highlights.â € â € Stay in the Loop!
nodes.title: Loop Team - Virtual office with deep presence for distributed teams

nodes.excerpt: Firefoo is a sophisticated GUI tool for Firebase Cloud Firestore. View and edit your data in a table, tree or JSON, export to JSON and CSV, and run queries from a JavaScript shell.
nodes.title: Firefoo - Gain power over your Cloud Firestore data with a smart GUI
nodes.author: Matt Henderson ğŸš€

nodes.excerpt: Fully cross-platform, vendor-agnostic, markdown based note-taking app. With NotesHub your notes truly belong to you and not tight to any particular vendor. All of your data is stored in Git repositories, so you can clone them and manage outside the app.
nodes.title: NotesHub - Fully cross-platform, markdown based note-taking app
nodes.author: Alex Titarenko

nodes.excerpt: Unified all in one personal workflow notion system. Life is full of options and noise. By applying the best systems, you can focus on what truly add value to your life.
nodes.title: Obsidian Life OS - A unified workflow system built in Notion
nodes.author: Deepak Yadav

nodes.excerpt: eezy is your new lifestyle planner! Driven by artificial intelligence, eezy connects you to things to do and new friends to enjoy them with, all based on your psychological profile, preferences, and current mood. Optimize your free time and start living eezy!
nodes.title: eezy - Daily adventures for ambitious people
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: A simple coffee calculator to help you brew a great cup of coffee with whatever measurements you have available. Use grams, cups, fluid ounces, or tablespoons to calculate either water or beans for your ideal brew ratio.
nodes.title: Brew Ratio - A simple coffee calculator to help you brew a great cup
nodes.author: Matt Shwery

nodes.excerpt: Outfunnel's App connector makes it incredibly easy to create deep data connections between all your marketing tools and CRM (Copper, Pipedrive, HubSpot). Not very exciting, but extremely useful if youâ€™d like your sales and marketing people to work together.
nodes.title: App Connector by Outfunnel - Connect your sales and marketing data, deeply and easily
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: A lot of apps help you schedule your day but very few can help you with what should go into your schedule. We remind you of the small things, like doing laundry or paying your bills, so you don't have to sweat the small things.
nodes.title: AI Adulting - Personalised reminders to adult, powered by machine learning
nodes.author: Michael Davies

nodes.excerpt: One good thing is a curated repository of ideas and thoughts to keep you motivated during tough times. Feeling overwhelmed and looking for something feel-good? One good thing lets you discover an activity that can restore goodness.
nodes.title: One Good Thing - Discover a good thing you can do to brighten up your day

nodes.excerpt: Unlock the full potential of collaborative workflow automation with the team version of Automate.io. Connect your business apps and automate repetitive processes collaboratively with your team to boost business growth and productivity.
nodes.title: Automate.io - Enabling teams to automate work collaboratively
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Tired of your URLs being just too darn short? Worry no further, as Ax56 has got your back. No need to be anxious about people thinking the size of your URL is too small, as it will guaranteed be the largest one around. What are you waiting for, give it a go!

nodes.author: Piero Maddaleni
